title: They're missing Custom Item Sets
body: ლ(ಠ益ಠლ) Where the poop is the 'item sets' page. guess they forgot or maybe I need glasses.

replies.body: I'm not sure if this is a bug or something, but when I went back to the old client to change my item sets, even though I saved them, they would stay unchanged in game.

Not everything in profile is implemented yet. If it still isn't in when they've completed profiles then I'd submit feedback saying you want it as a feature. Custom item sets aren't critical for a smooth play loop so they are lower priority than something like the champion pages.
Ah, indeed  That makes sense :D   but it doesn't make dollars. In the future I'll send a request if needed (°ロ°)☝

Remember that this is an alpha, not even a beta yet, it's about testing the partial experience so they know everything is running smoothly. When it enters beta it'll be testing the whole experience and adding new features according to feedback.

It's not about making money, it's about making the experience outside of game as clean and enjoyable as possible.

Hell yeah! (ﾉ•ヮ•)ﾉ

& thx for the replies
